code: import React from'react';import{useTasks}from'../../context/TaskContext';import TaskItem from'./TaskItem';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskList=()=>{const{tasks,loading,error}=useTasks();if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert alert-info text-center",children:"Loading tasks..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert alert-danger text-center",children:error});}if(tasks.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"alert alert-info text-center",children:"No tasks yet."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TaskItem,{task:task},task.id))});};export default TaskList;
